text:
Greetings everyone! :wave:
I'm a Product Designer here at HubSpot, and I come bearing exciting news. We are currently seeking participants to join our exclusive alpha testing program for the latest update to our Page and Blog Editor.

In this new update, we've streamlined the workflow to allow you to publish and update pages and blogs with just a single click, all while keeping you seamlessly within the editor. Yes, you read that right! No more pesky confirmation modals interrupting your work.

If this sounds like something you'd like to be a part of, please reply with your Portal ID to this message. (We will be closing the list once we reach 15 participants)

Hi <@USPHM5E5R>, I'm very interested as I'm currently working on pages and blogs a lot. I just want to make sure that this alpha isn't going to interfere with the JS rendering blocks? <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C04AY1H2204> I'm creating a website fully with React so I wouldn't want the new interface to interfere, but if it doesn't I would love to try it!
My portal ID is 39829731, see linked message. <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CEQQ9NFK2/p1694673934519369>
